title: Death rate from indoor air pollution vs. per capita energy use
subtitle: Death rates from indoor air pollution are measured as the number of deaths per 100,000 individuals. [Primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) is based on the [substitution method](#dod:substitutionmethod) and measured in [kilowatt-hours](#dod:watt-hours) per person.

display.name: Death rate from indoor air pollution
